ch0045_40_tsukushi/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been looking
forward to seeing you!
ch0045_40_tsukushi/0101_0701_02_10:
I want to show you what Kricketune and I’ve
learned from our studies!
ch0045_40_tsukushi/7101_0701_01_10:
My latest great discovery has been the joy of
music!
ch0045_40_tsukushi/7101_0701_02_10:
I’ll keep on researching how to sound better
and better...
ch0045_40_tsukushi/7101_0701_03_10:
until I can give everyone around me the gift of a
fun performance!
ch0045_40_tsukushi/7102_0701_01_10:
I love all bug Pokémon’s cries—not just
Kricketune’s!
ch0045_40_tsukushi/7102_0701_02_10:
I bet I could ace a Pokémon cry quiz...as long as
it were only bug Pokémon!
ch0045_40_tsukushi/7103_0701_01_10: Do you know anyone interested in bug Pokémon?
ch0045_40_tsukushi/7103_0701_02_10: If you think of anyone, let me know!
ch0045_40_tsukushi/7103_0701_03_10:
As a gift, I’d like to introduce them to one, so they
can learn to love them!
ch0045_40_tsukushi/7104_0701_01_10: I’m still not quite used to this outfit.
ch0045_40_tsukushi/7104_0701_02_10:
I usually wear clothes that are easy to move in so
I can observe bug Pokémon easier.
ch0045_40_tsukushi/7104_0701_03_10: I’ll have to be careful not to get these too dirty!
ch0045_40_tsukushi/7105_0701_01_10: People see bug Pokémon in all sorts of ways.
ch0045_40_tsukushi/7105_0701_02_10:
People who like them think they’re cool or cute,
while others say they’re scary...
ch0045_40_tsukushi/7105_0701_03_10:
How do bug Pokémon look to you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0045_40_tsukushi/1701_0701_01_10:
I’ve a special present for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0045_40_tsukushi/1701_0702_01_10: I’ve been researching what things you like!
ch0045_40_tsukushi/2501_0701_01_10: Kricketune express their emotions through music.
ch0045_40_tsukushi/2501_0701_02_10:
Most of their tunes are shared by all Kricketune,
but there’s some variation between individuals.
ch0045_40_tsukushi/2501_0701_03_10:
So I’ve been analyzing how and when Kricketune’s
cries differ.
ch0045_40_tsukushi/2501_0701_04_10:
I’m so happy whenever I find a pattern unique to
my Kricketune!
ch0045_40_tsukushi/2501_0702_01_10:
If I could understand what Kricketune’s cries mean,
I think we’d understand each other’s feelings
better.
ch0045_40_tsukushi/2501_0702_02_10:
And I’m sure if I knew how he was feeling,
our bond would grow even deeper!
ch0045_40_tsukushi/2511_0701_01_10:
Kricketune is a rare Pokémon in the Johto region,
so when I first encountered him, I was so happy.
ch0045_40_tsukushi/2511_0701_02_10:
It made me wonder how many bug Pokémon were
left in the world that I didn’t even know about.
An exciting thought!
ch0045_40_tsukushi/2511_0702_01_10:
I still study bug Pokémon a lot, even now.
I need to know more about them!
ch0045_40_tsukushi/2511_0702_02_10:
And someday, I’ll be an important professor who
knows all about every bug Pokémon in the world!
ch0045_40_tsukushi/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Shall we play you a tune to help
shake your sleepiness away?
ch0045_40_tsukushi/3003_0701_01_10:
I just had lunch, so I’m all fueled up for a day of
studying bug Pokémon!
ch0045_40_tsukushi/3005_0701_01_10:
On nights when you’re having trouble sleeping, try
listening to the sounds of bug Pokémon.
